body:
I love minecraft. Minecraft is probably my favorite app aside from The SimsFreeplay. To improve this app, it will need all these things...
‚Ä¢Fishing rods
‚Ä¢All the materials from the PC version
‚Ä¢Texture packs that you can select in options, and then use one of them (I would pay about 10.00$ for a texture pack if I had to)
‚Ä¢Skin changers
And that's it. I'm sorry that it's a lot, Mojang, but for it to top the Freeplay, it really does need to be improved. I like minecraft, but I really am starting to get bored with it. I might delete it soon, if these things don't happen.

body:
Mojang if you are reading this, I will be the happiest person alive. I want you to add these things:

Make it EXACTLY LIKE PC and Xbox PLZ plz PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ

Two add restone, pistons, and be able to go the the end.

I don't know if its my device or breaking blocks is really slow. PLZ PLZ PLZ fix that.

Be able to pick a seed YOU like and play it. (Have a list of a bunch of good seeds)

Be able to join maps and get texture packs.

Make joining games much easier.

Add buttons and make power rails go WAY faster.

Make diamonds easier to find.

Give advice on how to find diamonds IN the app.

Add enchantments and hunger games maps and gamer tags.

Add a super flat.

MAKE SURE THERE IS SUGER CANE ON EVERY WORLD!!!!! I have gone on so many worlds and got all the ingredients except ONE
Sugar cane.

Be able to make maps such as maps people want to share or show off, hunger games, or just chatting.

Have us be able to create our own skin or pick.

I'm sure girls (me) don't like Steve skins which is a boy!

Make a cat skin.

Be able to upload skins from other games like Pixel Gun 3d.

I have been playing minecraft for 2 years and its getting boring.

Be able to place blocks faster.

MAKE THE NEW UPDATE SOON!!!!!!!!!!!!

If you read this, please add all these things or support them!!

Thank you!

body:
Hey Mojang,
This is a great game. I really love all the creative things you can do when your going on a long car ride, playing with friends, or even just loafing around. I have seen many reviews saying things like:" SCREW THIS IT DOESNT HAVE HORSES" or like:" THIS IS BORING A WASTE OF SEVEN DOLLARS", but I just want to tell you to not listen to them. This is your game, and it updates when YOU want it to, and adds what YOU want it to have. Thanks for all the hard work you do, and keep it up!

-OrangeHatGamer

.

body:
I'm totally addicted to Minecraft and I can't wait for the next update!(0.9.0)
But I have a few suggestions that still aren't being included!
1. Fishing pole and fish- I think that more food, such as fish, might risen the players chances in survival because Mojang is always adding mobs in stuff
2. More mods(Blazes, Enderman, cave spiders, Ghasts, etc.)
3. More animals(wolves, squids, mooshrooms, ocelots, and cats
4. Dispensers
5. Chain armour
6. Night, mods, all weapons and armour, and the ability to access chests in creative
7. Vines
8. More places(Jungles, Bigger Nether, The End, and caves)
9. Bigger worlds
10. More rare mods
11. Skin ability without Mojang account
12. Enchanting tables, potions
13. Horses
14. Item frames and heads
If Mojang added these simple things, it'd make everyone happy!
But PLEASE add Herobrine, I know, Im crazy but, I want to kill him soo bad!

body:
I love this app and I play it all the time but maybe you could add this in the next update...

Villages and villagers.

The option to craft and cook in creative mode.

Dogs,cats,ocelots,and squids

If we get those animals we could tame them and name them.

Peaceful mode would be awesome

If we could make a nether portal and go to the nether

Can we please have enderman and slimes

What about jungle biomes can we have that

Can we have a redstone block and could we be able to put down redstone

Can we have levers,preasure plates and buttons

It would be cool if we could have vines and be able to climb them

Can we have an option for super flat land

Lastly can we have skins and an option to choose your own skin

Thanks hopefully we get that in future updates

body:
The game has a lot things going for it. It's just that it has like half of the items and blocks of the PC version.
Here are some things I would like them to put on the game (PE):
HORSES
Saddles
Ender dragon
Switches
Iron doors
Pistons
Wires
Anchors
Chains
Real furniture
Cans
Computers
Able to plant crops (in creative)
The ability to sit or lay down
Baskets
Cushions
Engines
Clocks that are able to go on the wall
Rugs
Lighting that isn't torches
FOOD IN CREATIVE
Weather in both worlds
Bigger maps
Windows
Locks on both windows and doors
Shoes
Pipes and plumbing
These are just some of the things we should be able to have (in my opinion).
We should be able to have some of these in the next update.

Have a good good day!

What would also be nice is a block multiplyer. Like if you want 5x5 or 10x10 that would help with making buildings and stadiums
name: Guy u dont kno
title: Great game but MISSING DAY AND NIGHT IN CREATIVE

body: Great but I think pe users should be able to do the same stuff like PC users because the game kinda is boring I wish that we could use and do the same stuff with PE as in PC another big thing is potions I wold rate your game a 5 star but we can't use potions and I think every one would rate your game a 5 star if you come out with an update
